data.title: A sunshine day
data.content: There were days of clear, sunny skies, and it looked warm and warm, and the house was full of sunshine and warmth; A piece of flowers and plants, a lazy orange cat, an equally lazy old lady, a book, a tea table, a few cane chairs, a rocking chair, fuzzy warm cat nest...... Lazy winter, slow down the rhythm, this moment, is years static good appearance. Hiding in the sun room do not want to come out, read a book, play with a cat, play with flowers and plants; Wearing a golden sun, accompanied by an orange cat, a large area of exuberant vitality, warm, dizzy, unconsciously has passed the meal point. Quietly enjoy this moment of leisure and comfort, enjoy the warmth given by nature, not to think about life. This is a good moment.
